Class Battleship

  • java.lang.Object
    • gridworld.actor.Actor
      • Battleship

  • public class Battleship
extends Actor
    A class to contain all information on the complete Battleship.
    Version:
    05/24/2017
    Author:
    Phillip Sturtevant

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Battleship()
      Constructs a vertical Battleship of class Destroyer with a size of 2.
      Battleship(int sizeInput, boolean setCruiserName)
      Constructs a Battleship with a given size and name.

        setCruiserName - true if Battleship is a Cruiser, false if it is not

      • setShipRotation

        public void setShipRotation(boolean horizontal)
        Sets the Battleship rotation (for image orientation) for the Computer based on input locations from file.
        Parameters:
        horizontal - true if Battleshp is horizontal, false if Battleship is vertical

      • setGridError

        Sets whether the Player placed a Battleship in column 11.

        errorInput - true if Player placed Battleship in column 11, false if they did not

        Sets whether the Player rotated a Battleship over another Battleship
        Parameters:

        Sets whether Player rotated a Battleship over the grid boundary
        Parameters:

      • shipSunk

        public boolean shipSunk()
        Checks if the Battleship is sunk.
        Returns:
        true if the Battleship is sunk, false if the Battleship is alive

        Overrides the act method in the Actor class to do nothing.

        act in class Actor

      • canMove

        public boolean canMove(int direction)
        Prevents the Battleship parts from being destroyed at Battleship world boundary.
        Parameters:
        direction - the direction the Player intends to move ship
        Returns:
        true if the Battleship can be moved to the next location, false if the Battleship cannot be moved to the next location

      • move

        public void move(int direction)
        Moves the Battleship in the given direction.
        Parameters:
        direction - the direction in which the Player chose to move their Battleship

      • rotate

        public void rotate(java.util.ArrayList<Location> shipLocations)
        Rotates the ship if it is not within proximity of either another Battleship or the Battleship world boundary.
        Parameters:
        shipLocations - the locations of all other placed ships in the Player's set-up Battleship world

      • imageRotator

        public void imageRotator()
        Rotates the BattleshipPart images when the Battleship object rotates.
